about_the_game:
Welcome to Wonder Library

Step into Wonder Library, a magical world where picture books come to life. Here, you can embark on adventures, complete quests, or simply take your time to enjoy the beauty of this world at your own pace.

Wonder Library is set on a peaceful island with a massive picture book library surrounded by nature. Inside, you’ll experience a variety of exhibitions, special events, and immersive storytelling that unfold before your eyes. What if the characters from your favorite books came alive? Join them and create your own unique story.

Sometimes, all you need is to take in the beauty of a single page. Wonder Library offers a place of relaxation, warmth, and discovery—where imagination meets reality.

In Wonder Library, you can dive into a world of picture books like no other. From cherished classics to interactive 3D stories, there’s something to captivate everyone. Across the island, you’ll also discover soothing adventures in places like the Forest of Meditation, Meadow of Fortune, Witch's Cabin, Mountain of Freedom, and Wisderland.

Features:

  • Borrow hundreds of picture books from the Picture Book Library

  • Animation Theater

  • Virtual exhibition spaces for picture books and illustrations

  • Hidden missions and special events

  • Discover characters and hidden secrets around the island

  • High-quality lectures and interactive events to enjoy on the island

Simple and Intuitive Controls:

  • Drag the mouse to look around.

  • Left-click to walk.

  • Right-click to interact with the world.

  • Scroll to zoom in or out on a picture book.

Wonder Library runs on any Windows PC with functional 3D graphics. It has been tested on Windows 7, 8, and 10, but not yet on Steam OS, Mac, or Linux.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel CORE i5-12400F / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtak

short_description: Wonder Library is a storytelling adventure game that blends picture books with interactive gameplay, set in a magical library on a peaceful island. Players embark on a journey of self-discovery and healing as they explore the enchanting world and uncover stories that come to life.
